column5: Headed out to Lake St.Claire a few weeks back and havent posted about it yet .. went down with my son and a few friends ... didnt get alot of action but my friend Rob managed a 48" muskie ... she was beat up pretty bad .. a little lampray was on her when landed (not on her when realeased  ) ... brought some walley filets for super and I am looking forward to BOQ next weekend        any ideas on how to make pics bigger?
Make sure you click on the picture to make it bigger before you get the properties. Fixed it up for you.  And..nice fish!

Congrats on a nice fish.   Looks like lots of lamprey scars on the fish's back.  Here's a pic of a 47" fish caught during an MCI tournament a few years back. Note the lamprey hanging off the fish near the lower rear fin.
Nice fish, Congrats and the shore lunch looks tasty.
